body:

- [x] Test that Sample debug with Lerna worksapce is working

# Debug in VSCode

If you dont allready have it, craete a folder called .vscode in your root project. In this folder create a file called launch.json.

## Sample debug 

Change out args with the hardhat args you want to run with debug.
```json
{
  "version": "0.2.0",
  "configurations": [
    {
      "type": "node",
      "request": "launch",
      "name": "npx hardhat",
      "skipFiles": ["<node_internals>/**"],
      "runtimeExecutable": "${workspaceFolder}/node_modules/hardhat/internal/cli/cli.js",
      "args": ["node", "--verbose", "--watch"], 
      "console": "integratedTerminal",
      "cwd": "${workspaceFolder}/src",
    },
  ]
}
```


## Sample debug with Lerna workspace

Change out MyProject with the package you want to debug.
Change out args with the hardhat args you want to run with debug.
```json
{
  "version": "0.2.0",
  "configurations": [
    {
      "type": "node",
      "request": "launch",
      "name": "npx hardhat",
      "skipFiles": ["<node_internals>/**"],
      "runtimeExecutable": "${workspaceFolder}/packages/MyProject/node_modules/.bin/hardhat",
      "args": ["node", "--verbose", "--watch"],
      "console": "integratedTerminal",
      "cwd": "${workspaceFolder}/packages/MyProject",
    },
  ]
}
```
